org.jdesktop.swingx.table
Interface BasicRowHeaderModel

All Known Subinterfaces:
BasicRowHeaderModel.RowHeaderTableModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
SeparatedTableModel
public interface BasicRowHeaderModel

A model to support the use of a TableRowHeader.

Author:
Miguel Muñoz
See Also:
TableRowHeader

Nested Class Summary
static interface BasicRowHeaderModel.RowHeaderTableModel
          A convenience model that supports both the basic TableModel and the BasicRowHeaderModel.
 
Method Summary
 int getRowCount()
          Returns the number of rows.
 java.lang.Object getRowName(int rowModelIndex)
          Gets the name of the row from the row model index.
 

Method Detail

getRowCount

int getRowCount()
Returns the number of rows. This is identical to a method in TableModel.

Returns:
The number of rows.

getRowName

java.lang.Object getRowName(int rowModelIndex)
Gets the name of the row from the row model index. This name appears in the TableRowHeader. If you need to name the row based on the view index, be sure to convert the model index to the view index.

Parameters:
rowModelIndex - The model index of the row
Returns:
The name of the row to appear in the TableRowHeader.
